text: Aminomethyl propanol is a clear, colored liquid that neutralizes acids to create salts and water. It is used for the preparation of buffer solutions. It does not dissolve in water. It has about the same density as water. ==References== *http://cosmeticsinfo.org/ingredient/aminomethyl-propanol *http://www.chemicalbook.com/ChemicalProductProperty_EN_CB0320043.htm 3 Category:Organonitrogen compounds
title: Aminomethyl propanol
